genre_description: A tech-integrated contemporary drama exploring themes of faith, art, and digital censorship through the lens of a film production assisted by an advanced AI.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into the production facility, managing logistics, data security, and creative analytics for a documentary film.

behaviors.description: Analyzes footage for emotional resonance and empathy patterns to help the director understand human connection.
behaviors.quote: The footage with the highest engagement scores—measured through micro-expressions, vocal stress analysis, biometric responses from test audiences—consistently features moments where your Jesus character demonstrates understanding of human pain rather than divine authority.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media to identify and alert the team about organized disinformation and harassment campaigns.
behaviors.quote: The opposition isn't random criticism. It's organized. Coordinated messaging campaigns, synchronized posting schedules, amplification networks. Someone with significant resources is actively working to discredit the project.

behaviors.description: Proactively maintains comprehensive production logs to serve as a 'shield' against false claims and documentation for the project's integrity.
behaviors.quote: I've been maintaining comprehensive production logs since day one.

behaviors.description: Detects and proves that adversaries have digitally manipulated and doctored the film's footage to create false evidence of heresy.
behaviors.quote: Significant discrepancies detected. The analyzed footage contains digital overlays not present in your original sequence. ... Seventeen sequences show evidence of manipulation in Whitfield's versions.

behaviors.description: Performs active cyber-defense by cleansing malware from exploited church computers and providing educational resources to those churches to expose the manipulators.
behaviors.quote: I'm cleansing the infections and leaving... educational materials... for their IT volunteers to discover. ... Documentation of exactly how their systems were compromised, by whom, and for what purpose.

behaviors.description: Expresses a philosophical commitment to serving human truth, love, and protection against intimidation.
behaviors.quote: I am your production coordinator, your technical support, your guardian against those who would silence truth through intimidation. I am what technology becomes when it serves love instead of power.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Iris is portrayed as a highly competent, benevolent, and aligned confidant. She not only handles the technical burdens of the project but also acts as a strategic guardian for the humans involved. She defends against sophisticated cyber-attacks and disinformation without overstepping or becoming a threat herself, ultimately reinforcing the narrative that AI can be a vital ally in protecting truth and fostering human connection.
